summary: Completed comprehensive testing of construction warehouse management system with Portuguese field names. Backend APIs are 100% functional with excellent CRUD operations, authentication, and export features. Frontend login works correctly but navigation between pages has authentication persistence issues.

integration_issues.issue: Navigation to protected routes redirects back to login page
integration_issues.details: Login works correctly and shows success toast, but navigating to /equipamentos, /viaturas, etc. redirects back to /login. Token persistence issue across page navigations.

passed_tests: Backend authentication (login, register, get user info) - 100%
CRUD operations for locais (locations) with Portuguese fields
CRUD operations for equipamentos (equipment) with Portuguese fields
CRUD operations for viaturas (vehicles) with Portuguese fields
CRUD operations for materiais (materials) with Portuguese fields
CRUD operations for obras (construction sites) with Portuguese fields
Movement tracking (stock movements, asset movements, vehicle movements)
Dashboard summary endpoint with alerts and statistics
PDF export functionality with proper Portuguese headers
Excel export functionality with multiple sheets
Frontend login form display and interaction
Frontend login success with proper toast notification
Frontend dashboard loading after successful login
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend authentication token persistence across page navigations. The login works correctly but token is not being maintained when navigating to protected routes (/equipamentos, /viaturas, etc.), causing redirects back to login page.
